units.title: Cell preparation for 10x loading
units.text: Cells were centrifuged for 5 min at 200g and resuspended in mTeSR1, filtered through a 20-μm strainer and washed with mTeSR1. Cells were then centrifuged again for 5 min at 200g and resuspended in mTeSR1, counted, diluted to the same concentration and mixed at equal ratios for the three cell lines to be loaded on the 10x microfluidic chip aiming for 10,000 cells.
units.rationale: Describes the steps to obtain a single‑cell suspension suitable for microfluidic capture.

units.title: 10x single‑cell library preparation
units.text: In brief, cells were mixed with reverse transcription mix, gel beads and oil were loaded on the chip device to be coencapsulated into droplets, which underwent first strand cDNA synthesis thereby tagging mRNAs with a UMI and a unique cell barcode.
units.rationale: Outlines the core droplet‑based workflow for generating barcoded cDNA libraries.

units.title: Post‑droplet processing and sequencing
units.text: All following steps were conducted in bulk by breaking the droplets and cleaning up and amplifying ... sequenced on two lanes of a flow cell.
units.rationale: Covers the bulk cleanup, amplification, and sequencing of the single‑cell libraries.

units.title: Organoid fixation and cryoprotection
units.text: Organoids were washed in PBS before fixing in 4% PFA. The excess of fixative was removed with three PBS washes and organoids were then transferred to a 30% sucrose solution for 24–48 h for cryoprotection. Finally, organoids were transferred to plastic cryomolds (Tissue Tek) and embedded in OCT.
units.rationale: Details the fixation, cryoprotection, and embedding steps for downstream histology.

units.title: Antigen retrieval for immunostaining
units.text:
Then, sections were incubated in antigen retrieval solution (HistoVT One, ...) at 70 °C for 20 min.
Organoid pieces were incubated in Papain at 37 °C (enzyme mix 1) for an 1:1,000, followed by addition of Enzyme A (enzyme mix 2) to the Papain mix. Organoid pieces were then triturated using wide-bore 1,000‑µl tips and incubated for additional intervals of 5–10 min.
units.rationale: Specifies the heat‑mediated antigen retrieval step prior to antibody staining.

units.title: Mycoplasma testing of cultures
units.text:
Mycoplasma testing was performed using PCR validation (Venor GeM Classic, Minerva).
A second step of demultiplexing was done using demuxlet35, based on the genotyping applied to the above ...
units.rationale: Ensures cell cultures are free of mycoplasma contamination.

units.title: Pseudotime block segmentation
units.text: Each pseudotime course was evenly broken into 50 blocks. The ten nearest neighbours of each seed, based on Euclidean expression levels of pseudocells ... were calculated.
units.rationale: Explains how continuous trajectories were discretized for downstream analysis.

units.title: Embedding and cryosectioning of organoids
units.text: Organoids were transferred to plastic cryomolds (Tissue Tek) and embedded in OCT. Sections were quickly washed in PBS to remove any residual ...
units.rationale: Combines embedding and section washing steps required before microscopy.
